name: Michelle Fairley
info:
• 简体中文名: 米歇尔·菲尔利
  • 别名: ミシェル・フェアリー
  • 性别: 女
  • 出生地: Coleraine, Northern Ireland
  • 国籍: Irish
detail: Michelle Fairley is a Northern Irish actress, best known for her roles as Catelyn Stark in the HBO series Game of Thrones, Dr. Ava Hessington in multiple episodes of USA Network series Suits, and as terrorist Margot Al-Harazi, a main antagonist in 24: Live Another Day.

voices.name: Catelyn Stark
